SELECT TD003, TD004, TD005, TD006, TD012, TC004, MA002, MA011, TD007, MC002, TD008, TD015, (TD008-TD015) AS TD008_TD015 , TD016, TC001+'-'+TC002 AS TC001_TC002, TC011 FROM [DTR_TW].[dbo].PURTC left join [DTR_TW].[dbo].PURTD ON PURTC.TC001+PURTC.TC002 = PURTD.TD001+PURTD.TD002 AND PURTD.TD016 = 'N' AND PURTC.TC014 = 'Y' left join [DTR_TW].[dbo].PURMA AS PURMA ON PURMA.MA001 = PURTC.TC004 left join [DTR_TW].[dbo].CMSMC AS CMSMC ON CMSMC.MC001 = PURTD.TD007 WHERE TD004 is not null AND (TD012 BETWEEN #{S_TD012} AND #{E_TD012} )
AND (TC001+'-'+TC002+'-'+TD003+'-'+TD004) not in
#{item}
ORDER BY TD012,TC001,TC002,TD003
